import React, { useState } from 'react' const Contact = () => { const [textInput, setText] = useState({ name: "", email: "", subject: "", message: "" }); const [data, setData] = useState({}); const submitData = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(data); setData((oldData) => { return { ...oldData, textInput } }); } const InputEventText = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; // console.log(text); setText((oldData) => { return { ...oldData, [name]: value } }) } return ( <>
